text: Exciting news: Between now and Purim, all donations to Sefariaâ€™s new Library Fund will be matched 1:1 by a generous donor.
Donations to this fund will directly support costs related to text acquisition, translation, digitization, and more. All support will help grow the library and enhance your Jewish learning.
Donate to the Library Fund TODAY and your donation will be DOUBLED up to $36,000!
